t: Large Selection from MVP Disc Sports – Disc Tree
s: MVP has a variety of plastic types for their discs. The most popular are Electron and Neutron. Electron is a baseline plastic that is designed to give a good grip, which is why it is popular for putters. Neutron is a premium plastic with high wear resistance that lasts for many years.

t: MVP Discs for Sale - Low Prices, Reviews, Pictures of Every Disc
s: MVP is one of the fastest growing disc golf manufacturers and includes dozens of disc molds and plastic varieties including the best glowing discs in the industry. They also sponsor Simon Lizotte who is one of the most popular professional disc golfers in the world.
